channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Girl, 10, killed and hundreds injured after electronic pagers explode in Lebanon
item.description: Hundreds of handheld pagers exploded near-simultaneously across Lebanon and in parts of Syria on Tuesday, wounding members of the militant group Hezbo...

item.title: Mysterious ‘flying angel’ appeared over the Peak District
item.description: 'I jumped out of my car and snapped away as it continued to form this mysterious angel-like shape.'

item.title: Motorists have been using 'defog' button on car wrong - but there's a simple fix
item.description: A TikTok user has shared the simple way to defog your windscreen without being forced to wipe it clean - and all you need to do is locate a certain bu...

item.title: ‘Living Nostradamus’ claims four of his 2024 prophecies have already come true
item.description: The psychic has made some grim predictions for 2024.

item.title: Man shares simple hack for making cheese toasties without mess - and it's a game-changer
item.description: The cheese toastie (or grilled cheese to our friends across the pond) is a staple lunch option for a lot of sandwich lovers - but making them can be a...

item.title: Prince Philip was ‘meant to meet an alien called Janus in a Chelsea flat’
item.description: Janus had an 'ethereal otherworldly quality', a documentarianhas said.

item.title: Simple activity you should do every day to reduce risk of dementia

item.title: ‘I buy my mum this beauty advent calendar every year – 2024’s is the best yet’
item.description: Beauty editor Laura has already got her hands on Elemis's 2024 Ultimate Skincare Advent Calendar, and had a peek inside – here's her honest review...
